mapper.select: SELECT ur.resource_id resourceId, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_resource_relation rrr ON r.role_id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN resource ur ON ur.resource_id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.users_id = #{usersId} AND ur.resource_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.resource_id
SELECT DISTINCT ar.users_id FROM role_resource_relation rr LEFT JOIN admin_role_relation ar ON rr.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}
